pyromancySpells.name: Fire Breath
pyromancySpells.description: You spray a flame in a 4.5m Cone from you, target each creature within the area with a [CON] [SPELL TEST] against the targets [DODGE] and on a success they receive 2d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8 fire damage [HALF].
pyromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you deal an additional 1d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8 fire damage. Additionally every increase of 2 increases the Cone size by 1.5m.

pyromancySpells.name: Ignite
pyromancySpells.description: You can set the target on fire and it recieves the [BURNING I] Status Effect.
pyromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, if you increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 3, the target instead suffers the [BURNING II] Status Effect and if you increase it by 6, the effect becomes [BURNING III]

pyromancySpells.name: Fireball
pyromancySpells.description: You launch a small fire projectile at the designated location that you can see and without amy obstructions. It then errupts in a fiery that hits all creatures within that sphere. Make an [INT] [SPELL TEST] against the creatures [DODGE] on a success they take 6d6 + [SPI] * d6 fire damage [HALF] .
pyromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 2 and for every increase of 2, improve the radius increases by 1.5m and the damage by 2d6 + ([SPI] / 4) * d6.

pyromancySpells.name: Erruption
pyromancySpells.components: V (Incantation), S, M (Rocky or Earthen Ground)
pyromancySpells.description: Out of the ground a hole with a 4.5m Diameter errupts and a magma stream shoots out of the ground and hits all creatures inside it. Make an [INT] [SPELL TEST] against every creatures [DODGE] on a success they take 10 + [SPI] * d6 fire damage and 5 + [SPI]/2 * d6 physical damage [HALF]. For the remaining duration the Area counts as difficult Terrain and when a creature starts their [TURN] in the area or moves into the area for the first time in their [TURN] they recieve 5d6 + [SPI]/2 *d6 fire damage.
pyromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 3 and for every increase of 3, improve the radius by 1.5m and the duration by 1 [ROUND].

geomancySpell.name: Stone Barrier
geomancySpell.components: V (Incantation), S, M(nearby earth or stone)
geomancySpell.description: When you are hit by an [ATTACK] you can use your [REACTION] to constact a stone barrier with [HP] equal to 5 + [SPI]. As long as the Barrier is active and has remaining [HP] any [ATTACK] that would hit you now targets the Barrier instead, if the Barrier is destroyed any excess damage spills over to the caster.
geomancySpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the Barrierâ€™s [HP] is doubled

geomancySpell.name: Poison Touch
geomancySpell.description: Make a [MELEE SPELL ATTACK] against the target, on a hit if the [MELEE SPELL ATTACK] exceeds or matches the Targets [TOUGHNESS] they recieve 2d12 + ([SPI] / 4) * d12 poison damage and recieve the [WEAKENED I] status effect for the duration. [HALF]
geomancySpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the damage is increased by  1d12 + ([SPI] / 4) * d12.

hydromancySpells.name: Acid Stream
hydromancySpells.description: You spray corrosive gas and liquids in a 9m long and 1.5m wide line in front of you, target each creature within the area with a [INT] [SPELL TEST] against the targets [DODGE] and on a success they take 2d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8 acid damage [HALF].
hydromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you deal an additional 1d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8 acid damage.

hydromancySpells.name: Icy Floor
hydromancySpells.description: You create a 3m sphere ice floor at the disignated location. This now counts as difficult Terrain and additionally make a [INT] [SPELL TEST] against every creature currently on the Ice Floor against their [DODGE] on a success those creatures are knocked [PRONE]. Additionally all creatures starting their turn on the Ice floor recieve d6 cold damage.
hydromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase, the sphere increases by 3m, the range by 6m and the damage by 2d6

hydromancySpells.name: Blizzard
hydromancySpells.components: V (Incantation), S, M (Clouds in the sky, or fog in the air)
hydromancySpells.description: You summon a raging blizzard within the target area. During the duration of the Spell the following applies. If a creature starts its turn within the Blizzard or enters it for the first time it suffers 4d6 + [SPI]/2 * d6 cold damage. The area is difficult Terrain and every creature within the Blizzard benefits from [PARTIAL CONCEALMENT], however every other creature is also partially concealed from them.
hydromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by two and for every increase of 2, improve the range by 3m, the radius by 1.5m and the damage by 1d6 + [SPI]/4 * d6

aeromancySpells.name: Lightning Spark
aeromancySpells.components: V (Incantation), S, M (object consisting of conductive material)
aeromancySpells.description: You conjure forth a small lightning spark that can bounce between enemies. Make a [RANGED SPELL ATTACK] against a Target within range that you can see, on a hit the target takes 2d10 + ([SPI] / 4) * d10 electric damage. On success you can repeat the [RANGED SPELL ATTACK] against another creature not yet targeted within 6m of the previous target, on a hit it takes 1d10 less electric damage than the previous hit. This can be repeated until a miss, no targets are left or no damage is left.
aeromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase deal an additional 1d10 + ([SPI] / 4) * d10 initial electric damage.

aeromancySpells.name: Gust of Wind
aeromancySpells.description: You conjour forward a gust of wind that pushes away all enemies within a 6m cone. Make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the targets [HARDNESS] if the test is successfull the targets are pushed away [SPI] m and are knocked [PRONE].
aeromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the cone increases by 3m.

aeromancySpells.name: Fly
aeromancySpells.description: You manipulate the aircurrents and the elemental energy of the air plane around you allowing you to fly. For the duration of the spell you gain fly(1.5m âˆ— ([SPI] / 2)) speed.
aeromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 2 and the duration improves to 1 Minute, increase it by further 3 and the duration improves to 1 hour.

aeromancySpells.name: Compress
aeromancySpells.description: You create a vaccum at the center of your area and the air as well as loose objects and creatures within the area are sucked in towards the center. Make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the [HARDNESS] of each creature. On a fail they are moved towards the center and suffer 6d6 phyiscal damage. On a fail they are only moved 1.5m towards the center and suffer no damage.
aeromancySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 2 and for every increase of 2, improve the range by 3m, the radius by 1.5m and the damage by 2d6.

lightSpells.name: Divine Bolt
lightSpells.description: You shoot a bolt of divine energy at a target far away that you can see. Make a [RANGED SPELL ATTACK], on a hit the Target take 2d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8 holy damage and if the [ATTACK] exceeds the targets [TOUGHNESS] it is additionally [STUNNED I] until the start of your next turn.
lightSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the damage by 1d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8.

lightSpells.name: Holy Light
lightSpells.components: V (Prayer), S, M(a small relic in your hand)
lightSpells.description: You enchant an item you are holding and it shines bright light within a 6m aura and dim light up to 12m. At the time of casting make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the [TOUGHNESS] of every creature within the bright light created by this spell. On a success enmies recieve ([SPI] / 2) * d6 holy damage [HALF] and are blinded [SAVE ENDS].
lightSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can boost the bright light aura by 2m and dim light by 4m.

lightSpells.name: Shield of Faith
lightSpells.description: A translucent shield envelopes the target and it recieves [PROTECTION I] status effect..
lightSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, if you increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 3, the target instead recieves the [PROTECTION II] Status Effect and if you increase it by 6, the effect becomes [PROTECTION III].

restorationSpells.name: Bless
restorationSpells.components: V (Prayer), S, M (a springling of holy water)
restorationSpells.description: All selected targets recieve the [BLESS I] status effect for the duration.
restorationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase an additional creature can be targeted.

restorationSpells.name: Heal
restorationSpells.description: You heal a target for 2d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8 . Alternatively undead creatures can be targeted by this spell with a [MELEE SPELL ATTACK] and on a success they do not heal but instead take holy damage eqal to the heal instead.
restorationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the heal increases by 1d8 + ([SPI] / 4) * d8.

restorationSpells.name: Cleanse
restorationSpells.description: You can remove one Tier 1 Status Effect affecting a target. Select a Status Effect affecting a target and make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against [DT] of the [SAVE] when the Status Effect was applied, if no [SAVE] was made, the [DT] is 10.
restorationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, if you increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 3,you can choose to remove a Tier 2 Status Effect and if you increase it by 6, you can choose to remove a Tier 3 Status Effect.

restorationSpells.name: Sanctuary
restorationSpells.components: V (Prayer), S, M(holy water sprinkled on the ground)
restorationSpells.description: You bless the ground below you and create a 4.5m (3 square) radius sanctuary. Each allied creature (including yourself) that starts its turn in the sancutuary or eneters the area for the first time regains ([SPI]/2) * d6 [HP] and each evil enemy creature that starts its turn there or enters it for the first time recieves ([SPI]/2) * d6 holy damage.
restorationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and increase the damage/heal by 1d6 and the duration by 1 [ROUND].

necromancySpell.name: Create Undead Servant
necromancySpell.components: V (Prayer), S, M(A nearby corpse or bone remnants)
necromancySpell.target: Corpse of a creature up to [LEVEL] 1
necromancySpell.description: You conduct an unholy Ritual binding the soul of the former inhabitant of the corpse. The corpse or skeleton becomes animate and obeys your commands. Depending on the spirit of the inhabitant they retain more of their personality. You can control an amount of undead equal to your [INT] at the same time. If the undead is reduced to 0 [HP] the spell ends early. After 24 hours the Corpse or Bones return to their former state unless you cast the spell again.
necromancySpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can target corpses of creatures one [LEVEL] higher.

necromancySpell.name: Curse
necromancySpell.description: You target a creatureâ€™s soul with a curse that you can see. Make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the targets [WILLPOWER] and on success it sufferes one of the following effects of your choice: [CURSED I], [FRIGHTENED I], [WEAKENED I], [VULNURABLE I], [DEAFENED], [SILENCED]. On a fail the target is affected for just 1 [ROUND].
necromancySpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can target an additional unit

necromancySpell.name: Steal Soul
necromancySpell.description: TODO: Long form Ritual, can remove soul and potentially store it somewhere. Target still lives but has lost soul

shadowSpell.name: Unholy Pyre
shadowSpell.description: You summon an unholy pyre from the Aether damaging the creatures in the Area. Make a [INT] [SPELL TEST] against all targets within the sphere against the targets [DODGE] and on a success they receive 2d8 + ([SPI]/4) * d8 unholy damage [HALF]
shadowSpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can deal an additional 1d8 + ([SPI]/4) * d8 damage.

shadowSpell.name: Darkness
shadowSpell.description: You summon dark energy from the Aether and engulf ta 4.5m sphere in complete darkness. Only magical light of a higher spell power than this can illuminate this area and even creatures with darkvision can not see in this area.
shadowSpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increases the sphere is enlarged by 1.5m and the duration is lengthed by 10 minutes.

divinationSpell.name: Hindsight
divinationSpell.description: If a friendly creature fails an [ATTRIBUTE TEST], you foresee the failure before it happens and can give the creature magically the benefit of hindsight and the creature gets a bonus to the [ATTRIBUTE TEST] equal to your [SPI].
divinationSpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, if you increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 3, you can use it also for an [ATTACK], [MARTIAL TEST] or [SPELL TEST] and if you increase it by 6, you can also use it for a [D20 TEST].

divinationSpell.name: Detect Magic
divinationSpell.components: V (Prayer), S, M(transperant or reflective object)
divinationSpell.description:
For the duration when somone looks through the object they can see traces of magical and the associated Spell Discipline (if present) energy which includes the following:
  • Magical creatures (Elemental, Cosmic, Undead) or Magical Items.
  • You know if a spell is currently affecting a creature or object, you don't know the exact spell, but you know the discipline.
  • You see if a spell was cast ther recently. Spells linger for a number of days equal to their Arcana Cost, you don't what exact spell, but you know the discipline.
divinationSpell.upCastingTheSpell:
When upcasting the spell, if you increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by the following, the Spell improves in the following ways:
  • Increase by 3: You know the Specific spell (if spell at all) that was cast.
  • Improve by 9: You see exactly what happened when the Spell was cast at the time.

divinationSpell.name: The Die is Cast
divinationSpell.description: You attempt to divine the near future and manipulate it. Roll a d20 and remember the result, at any point during the duration of the spell when you have to make a [D20 TEST] you can use this result instead. You can only benefit from one instance of this spell at a time.
divinationSpell.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 2 and for every increase you can roll one additional d20 per spell power.

telekinesisSpells.name: Telekinetic move
telekinesisSpells.description:
You can select one object or creature that you can see weighing up to [SPI] âˆ— 20 kg and magically move it, you have the following options:
  • Push/Pull: You can move the target up to a distance of 2 âˆ— [SPI] meters in any direction. If you target an unwilling creature or an item held by a creature you have to make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the creatures [HARDNESS] , on a success you move the creature or the item it is holding is freed from the creatureâ€™s grasp. Afterwards the spell ends.
  • Hover: Alternatively you can make the target hover in the air and move it [SPI] / 2 meters in any direction. While doing this for the duration of the spell each turn you can move the object again, when the spell ends the target is effected by gravity and other forces as normal. If the target is an unwilling creature you have to succeed on a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the creatures [HARDNESS] , when you fail the spell ends.
telekinesisSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the maximum object weight is doubled and the range increases by 3m.

telekinesisSpells.name: Telekinetic crush
telekinesisSpells.description: You target one object or creature that you can see and restrain it. Make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the targets [HARDNESS] on a success the target is restrained. Additionally you when you cast it and every following following turn the spell is still active you can deal [SPI] * d6 physical damage that canâ€™t be reduced by armor.
telekinesisSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can target an additional creature

transmutationSpells.name: Mutate
transmutationSpells.description:
You cause a minor mutation within a creature and can grant them one of the following benefits:
  • Quicken: Their limbs change to be more agile: the creature recieves the [HASTE I] status effect
  • Natural armor: The targetâ€™s skin becomes harder and grows more layers to protect it and it grants physical damage resistance equal to SPI. Does not stack with physical damage resistance granted by other armor and is treated as armor for all other effects.
transmutationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 2 and for every increase of 2 you can target one additional creature and the range increases by 1.5m

transmutationSpells.name: Quicken
transmutationSpells.description: You speed up all physical process of the target and it gains the [HASTE II] Status Effect.
transmutationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 4 and the target recieves the [HASTE III] status effect.

conjurationSpells.name: Magic Missiles
conjurationSpells.description: You create 3 magical darts, each of these darts targets a creature within range that you can see and designate. A missile does 1d4 + ([SPI] / 3) * 1d4 cosmic damage on impact.
conjurationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase 1 additional magic dart is created.

conjurationSpells.name: Create Object
conjurationSpells.description: You can create any tier 1 item of your choice that is not a consumable or something similar like food. The item has to fit in a [SPI] / 4 m Cube and it canâ€™t be hazardous on itâ€™s own like lava or poison but can be a sharp blade for instance. The item lasts for the duration and has a faint shimmer of the Aether to it making it appear as an obvious fake otherwise it shares the same properties. If a complicated item is created like a specific key for a keyhole or a inticrite mechanical device. The GM might call for a [INT] [SPELL TEST] depending on the difficulty and the casters knowledge.
conjurationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the item level can be 1 higher and the duration is tripled.

illusionSpells.name: Shroud
illusionSpells.description: The target recieves the [INVISIBLE I] status effect for the duration

illusionSpells.name: Illusary Image
illusionSpells.description: You create a silent unmoving illusary image of your choice that fits in a [SPI] / 2 m Cube. Make a [INT] [SPELL TEST] if other creatures are present, if your test is higher than the other creatures passive [INT] Investigation than they percieve the Illusion as real. If they later examine the Illusion and find obvious flaws in it, then they also stop percieving the Illusion as real.
illusionSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, if you increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by 2 you can make the image move but it canâ€™t be further than 21m (14 squares) away from you. If increase it by 4 you can add sound to the Illusion.

teleportationSpells.name: Cosmic Shift
teleportationSpells.description: You can teleport to a free space up to 3 + [SPI] m away.
teleportationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the range is doubled.

teleportationSpells.name: Extradimensional Pocket
teleportationSpells.description: You can target one object weighing up to [SPI] âˆ— 10 kg. and make it vanish into an extradimensional space. At any point you can cast this spell again and retrieve an item you have previously stored in your extradimensional pocket. Objects in the extradimensional space are perserved indefinete and do not wither or rot.
teleportationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the maximum object weight is doubled.

teleportationSpells.name: Emergency Teleport
teleportationSpells.description: If you are hit by an [ATTACK] you can use your reaction and teleport in a random direction (roll d8) a number of meters equal to d6+[SPI] causing the attack to miss. If the space where you would land is not free you land in the closest free space.
teleportationSpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can roll an additional d8 for the direction and choose any die for the direction you will be teleported.

telepathySpells.name: Mind Assault
telepathySpells.description: Select one creature with an [INT] greater than -4 within range that you can see, make a [SPI] [SPELL TEST] against the creatureâ€™s [WILLPOWER]. On a success it takes 2d8 + ([SPI]/4) * d8 psychic damage [HALF] and recieves [STUNNED I].
telepathySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase the damage by 1d8 + ([SPI]/4) * d8.

telepathySpells.name: Suggestion
telepathySpells.description: You make one request towards a creature with an [INT] greater than -4 within range that you can see. The request has to be a short sentence and be an action that can be completed within the Duration and does not completely go against the creatures regular course of action. Make a [CHA] [SPELL TEST] agains the targets [WILLPOWER] on a success the creature becomes charmed for the duration and completes the request, after which it feels strange about the request but is not aware that it was mind controlled by you. On a failed test the creature simply refuses.
telepathySpells.upCastingTheSpell: When upcasting the spell, increase the [ARCANA] Cost and Spell Difficulty by one and for every increase you can target one additional creatures and the range increases by 1.5m
